title: Man accidentally shoots brother while play wrestling, police say
content:
ST. PETERSBURG --
Police said two brothers were "play wrestling" in their home when the older brother's handgun discharged and hit the younger brother.
16-year-old shot in left side
Police say shooting was accidental
Teen is in stable condition at hospital
The incident occurred Thursday night in the 600 block of 44th Street South.
Authorities said the older brother's handgun was tucked in his waistband when it discharged. His 16-year-old brother was shot in his left side.
Names haven't been released.
The older brother, 22, drove his younger brother to Bayfront Health for treatment.
Police ruled the shooting accidental and said the older brother has a valid concealed firearm license.
The younger brother is in stable condition.
